chav1961.purelib.ui.interfacers

Interface WizardStep<Common,ErrorType extends Enum<?>,Content>

  • Type Parameters:
    Common - data type for the information shared with all the WizardStep instances (usually some descriptor to fill with wizard)
    ErrorType - type of the errors can be detected on the wizard execution stages. Any enumeration can be used
    Content - content type of the wizard step (for example, usually JComponent for the Swing application)
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWizardStep

    public interface WizardStep<Common,ErrorType extends Enum<?>,Content>

    This interface describes any entity that can be used as a step in the different wizard steps chain. The life cycle of the wizard step is:

    • prepare(Object, Map) - the same first call from the wizard
    • beforeShow(Object, Map, ErrorProcessing) - call before showing the wizard step in the wizard
    • validate(Object, Map, ErrorProcessing) - call before attempt to go to next wizard step
    • afterShow(Object, Map, ErrorProcessing) - call after hiding the wizard step in the wizard
    • unprepare(Object, Map) - the same last call from the wizard

    Internal group of life cycle can be repeated many times. Any wizards must support the life cycle and must guarantee this calling sequence

    Wizard step must be designed for correct subsequential usage in the other wizards after calling unprepare(Object, Map)

    Internal structure Map<String,Object> in beforeShow(Object, Map, ErrorProcessing), validate(Object, Map, ErrorProcessing) and afterShow(Object, Map, ErrorProcessing) methods is a temporary store to share with all Wizard steps and can be used for data interchange between them. Content of the store are unpredictable and implementation-specific before first calling these methods, and you need prepare it by self.

    Wizard step is not thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
    See Also:
    chav1961.purelib.streams.charsource

    • Method Detail

      • getStepId

        String getStepId()

        Get current step id

        Returns:
        any non-null and non-empty string. Need be unique in the given wizard steps chain

      • getNextStep

        String getNextStep()

        Get next step id

        Returns:
        id of the next step in the given wizard steps chain, or null if the next step appropriates to the natural step order in the given wizard steps chain. Can be changed under conditions

      • getPrevStep

        String getPrevStep()

        Get previous step id

        Returns:
        id of the previous step in the given wizard steps chain, or null if the previous step appropriates to the natural step order in the given wizard steps chain. Can be changed under conditions

      • getStepType

        WizardStep.StepType getStepType()

        Get step type

        Returns:
        step type. Can't be null

      • getTabName

        String getTabName()

        Get tab name in the tab collection for the given step

        Returns:
        any non-null and non-empty string. Can be identical with getStepId()

      • getCaption

        String getCaption()

        Get any caption for the given step

        Returns:
        any non-null and non-empty string.

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()

        Get human-readable description of the step

        Returns:
        any string. Can be identical with getCaption()

      • getHelpId

        String getHelpId()

        Get help id associated with the step.

        Returns:
        any non-null and non-empty string. Can be identical with getStepId()

      • getContent

        Content getContent()

        Get content kept inside the step

        Returns:
        any kind of content. Can't be null. Interpretation of the content is a scope of the wizard, not wizard step

      • prepare

        void prepare(Common content,
             Map<String,Object> temporary)
      throws PreparationException,
             LocalizationException,
             NullPointerException

        Prepare wizard step to use in the wizard

        Parameters:
        content - data type for the information shared with all the WizardStep instances (usually some descriptor to fill with wizard)
        temporary - temporary map to share with all the wizard steps in the given wizard. Every wizard step can use it for any purposes
        Throws:
        PreparationException - when any problems on the preparation stage were detected
        LocalizationException - when any localization problems were detected
        NullPointerException - if any of parameters are null

      • beforeShow

        void beforeShow(Common content,
                Map<String,Object> temporary,
                WizardStep.ErrorProcessing<Common,ErrorType> err)
         throws FlowException,
                LocalizationException,
                NullPointerException

        Prepare wizard step before showing it in the wizard

        Parameters:
        content - data type for the information shared with all the WizardStep instances (usually some descriptor to fill with wizard)
        temporary - temporary map to share with all the wizard steps in the given wizard. Every wizard step can use it for any purposes
        err - error processor
        Throws:
        FlowException - when any problems on the stage were detected
        LocalizationException - when any localization problems were detected
        NullPointerException - if any of parameters are null

      • validate

        boolean validate(Common content,
                 Map<String,Object> temporary,
                 WizardStep.ErrorProcessing<Common,ErrorType> err)
          throws FlowException,
                 LocalizationException,
                 NullPointerException

        Validate content of the wizard step. If your step is WizardStep.StepType.PROCESSING step, this method will be called asynchronously. You need implement all the functionality of the WizardStep.StepType.PROCESSING step in this method only. Returned value for this call is treated as jump to the next step on true and cancel wizard on false. Any exceptions thrown are treated as cancel wizard. To prevent this behavior, you can catch all exceptions inside the method and modify getNextStep() method to jump to different steps in the success or failure cases.

        This method is called with any wizards before either jumping to the next step or finishing wizard only. Neither cancellation, nor returning to the previous steps never calls this method.

        Parameters:
        content - data type for the information shared with all the WizardStep instances (usually some descriptor to fill with wizard)
        temporary - temporary map to share with all the wizard steps in the given wizard. Every wizard step can use it for any purposes
        err - error processor
        Returns:
        true if content is valid and pass to the next step is available
        Throws:
        FlowException - when any problems on the stage were detected
        LocalizationException - when any localization problems were detected
        NullPointerException - if any of parameters are null

      • afterShow

        void afterShow(Common content,
               Map<String,Object> temporary,
               WizardStep.ErrorProcessing<Common,ErrorType> err)
        throws FlowException,

        NullPointerException - if any of parameters are null
